author: paras@getbindu.com
name: web-extraction-agent
description: AI-powered agent that transforms unstructured web content into organized, structured data using Firecrawl and Exa search. Extracts comprehensive information from web pages and presents it in structured Pydantic models.

environment_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for LLM calls (required)
Mem0 API key for conversation memory
Exa API key for web search and content extraction (required)
Firecrawl API key for advanced web scraping (optional)
